input: ExecuteQueryWithReturn*!*Select job_header.job, job_header.suffix, concat(job_header.job, if(ltrim(job_header.suffix) = '', '', concat('-', job_header.suffix))) as ID, job_header.part, job_header.description, product_line, qty_order, qty_completed, '20' + right(job_header.date_due,2) + '-' + left (job_header.date_due,2) + '-' + right(left(job_header.date_due,4),2) as DATE_DUE, sum(hours_estimated) as num_hours, flag_hold, concat(LTRIM(RTRIM(comments_1)), concat(' ', LTRIM(RTRIM(comments_2)))) as COMMENTS, parent_wo, date_closed, notes From JOB_HEADER left join GAB_4169_WO_NOTES on job_header.job = GAB_4169_WO_NOTES.job and GAB_4169_WO_NOTES.suffix = job_header.suffix left join JOB_OPERATIONS on job_header.job = job_operations.job and job_header.suffix = job_operations.suffix and job_operations.lmo = 'L' where date_closed = '000000' and product_line in ('51', '52') group by job_header.job, job_header.suffix, job_header.part, job_header.description, product_line, qty_order, qty_completed, job_header.date_due, flag_hold, comments_1, comments_2, parent_wo, date_closed, notes ORDER BY DATE_DUE*!*FLDSER_HIS
